name: Sweep
headline: The best AI coding assistant for JetBrains
description: Sweep is the best enterprise AI coding assistant for JetBrains. No data ever leaves your VPC.

founders.name: William Zeng, Founder
founders.description:
Worked at Roblox as the youngest senior MLE at the company. Built the first vector search model + many search improvements.
Graduated from CMU with BS in Stats/ML. Now working on building the best AI coding assistant for JetBrains.

founders.name: Kevin Lu, Founder
founders.description: Previously: top of class at UWaterloo CS, built the first ML-based skin weight generation model for UGC avatars at Roblox, and NLP researcher on common sense reasoning (in the Bart/T5 era). Now building an AI-powered junior dev and interested in code gen and automated code gen orchestration.

generated_description:
**Company Overview: Sweep**

**Website:** [Sweep](https://sweep.dev/)

Founded in 2023, Sweep is an up-and-coming startup based in San Francisco that’s made its mark as a cutting-edge AI coding assistant, specifically designed for JetBrains IDEs like IntelliJ and PyCharm. It's part of the Y Combinator Batch S23, which is a prestigious accelerator known for nurturing innovative tech companies.

### Mission
Sweep's mission is simple yet ambitious: to be the best AI coding assistant for JetBrains users. By integrating seamlessly into the development environment, Sweep aims to streamline coding tasks while ensuring that data remains completely secure and confined to the user's Virtual Private Cloud (VPC).

### Team
Despite being a small team of four, Sweep boasts a focused and agile workforce. With the guidance of Diana Hu as their Group Partner, the team is dedicated to leveraging the latest advancements in artificial intelligence to enhance coding efficiency.

### Offerings
Sweep stands out by bringing the latest innovations in AI directly into JetBrains development tools. Their platform is designed to support a variety of JetBrains products, including IntelliJ and Android Studio. They also provide demo options for interested enterprises, allowing potential users to see the assistant in action.

### Trust and Security
One of the key selling points of Sweep is its commitment to privacy. As per their policy, no user data ever leaves their designated VPC, which is a significant concern for many enterprises today.

### Backing and Recognition
Sweep is recognized as part of the burgeoning tools in developer tech and artificial intelligence, making strides in a space that heavily leans towards automation and efficiency. The backing from Y Combinator adds a layer of credibility, highlighting their potential for growth and impact in the industry.

In conclusion, Sweep positions itself as a vital tool for developers looking to enhance their productivity while maintaining data security. With its forward-thinking approach to AI and a growing suite of offerings, Sweep is geared to become a preferred choice for organizations utilizing JetBrains tools.
